greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle of coefficients of Lucas polynomials.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for the first 50 rows, flattened
formula: a(n, k) = a(n-1, k) + a(n-2, k-1) with a(n, 0)=1 if n>0 and a(0, 0)=2.
xref: Alternative version of A034807. With alternating signs, these are the coefficients of the recurrences in A061897.
results.author: _Henry Bottomley_, May 14 2001
